name: ctUpdateFieldValue
description: Use this task to update a specific field value
author: cloudThing Ltd
helpMarkDown:
You supply a fetchxml expression, this must retrieves the single record you want to update. Supply the name of the field you want to update and the value you want to update it to.
Currently supported field types are string, integer, boolean, decimal, optionset (pass in the int value), money and datetime. Lookup fields are not currently supported.

inputs.name: targetOrg
inputs.label: Target Org Connection String
inputs.helpMarkDown: Connection string to the target organisation.

inputs.name: fetchXml
inputs.label: FetchXml
inputs.helpMarkDown: The fetch xml that will return the single record we should update

inputs.name: fieldName
inputs.label: Field Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The schema name of the field to update. Supported field types are string, int, bool, optionset (int value), datetime, decimal and money)

inputs.name: fieldValue
inputs.label: Update With This Value
inputs.helpMarkDown: The value to set into the stated field name of the record returned by the fetchXml.
